name: Circle Dragger - Beware Black Dots And Obstacles
name_original: Circle Dragger - Beware Black Dots And Obstacles
description:
The Circle Dragger is the best free adventure game which challenges your reflexes as well as eye hand coordination.

Tap and Hold the Circle Dragger to move along with your finger avoiding hitting black obstacles as well as edges. Let's see how far can you go along with the Circle Dragger.

How to Play?

Swipe left and right our finger to move the blue circle 
Just avoid the black and stay inside the pink. 
Avoid obstacles and watch out for tricks that lie behind every level! 

Amazing Game Features:

- 100+ Addictive & Challenging Game levels
- Every time a different maze to run
- Dynamic random obstacles
- Cool Graphics and a Interactive User Interface
- High Scores & Leader boards
- Smoothing & Relaxing Music
- Share with friends via social media
- Memory enhancer within game

More than 100 levels to test your reflexes and response time all while being in the state of motion upward through the narrowing width paths.  Enjoy the awesome adventure journey of circle dragger and relaxing sounds found within The Circle Dragger.
Challenging fun with addiction, but the circle dragger game also helps improving your memory and reflexes. 

It can help with memory by remembering how all the levels are set up and how to pass them. 

The better you get at your memory and response time the more likely be able to get to #1 on the high scores in this fantastic free arcade adventure game.

So what are you waiting for? Don't miss this great adventure journey Download the Circle Dragger on your iPhone now to enjoy the fun

If you Like it, Please Rate on iTunes with a nice user feedback as well as share Circle Dragger with your friends giving them an opportunity to enjoy ass well
